# uptimekuma_notification_splunk (Resource)

Splunk notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_splunk" "example" {
  name            = "Splunk Notification"
  rest_url        = "https://api.victorops.com/api/v2"
  severity        = "critical"
  auto_resolve    = "resolve"
  integration_key = "your_integration_key"
  is_active       = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `auto_resolve` (String) Action to take when a monitor recovers
- `integration_key` (String, Sensitive) Splunk On-Call routing key for alert routing
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `rest_url` (String, Sensitive) Splunk On-Call REST API URL endpoint
- `severity` (String) Alert severity level for triggered events

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
